pages.title: Crystal Ball
pages.text: Crystal balls are rather magical in general. They are most commonly used to predict the future and give out fortunes, but some claim they can be used for other things, such as remote viewing. The witches who claim to be able to do this usually can't prove itâ€¦

pages.title: Tarots
pages.text: needs text

pages.title: Player
pages.text: The player is a witch

pages.title: Witch
pages.text: The player owns spells, and how many

pages.title: Iron Golem
pages.text: The player has the Overworld Infusion

pages.title: Wither Skeleton
pages.text: The player has the Nether Infusion

pages.title: Enderman
pages.text: The player has the End Infusion

pages.title: Star
pages.text: The player has the Dream Infusion

pages.title: Cat
pages.text: The player is infused

pages.title: Sun
pages.text: The player is blessed, or cursed if reversed

pages.title: Moon
pages.text: The player is a vampire, or werewolf if reversed

pages.title: Evoker
pages.text: If reversed, the player is a spectre

pages.title: Silver Sword
pages.text: If reversed, the player is a witch hunter

pages.title: Guardian
pages.text: The player has killed a boss, and how many unique bosses killed

pages.title: Illusioner
pages.text: The player has a potion active, and the highest level

pages.title: Diamonds
pages.text: The player has a fortune active, reversed if the fortune is negative

pages.title: Stronghold
pages.text: The player has cast a ritual, and the amount cast

pages.title: Companions
pages.text: The player has a familiar, reversed if the familiar is not nearby

pages.title: Mounts
pages.text: The player has pets that aren't familiars, and the amount of pets

pages.title: Zombie
pages.text: The player has at least one protection poppet, and the amount of poppets

pages.title: Villager
pages.text: The player is in a coven, and how many members

pages.title: Wither
pages.text: The player has a contract with a spirit, and how many contracts

pages.title: Ender Dragon
pages.text: The player has killed at least 50 mobs, and the amount of mobs killed / 50

pages.title: World
pages.text: I AM ERROR
